name: Be Like Mark - The Prequel
description:
Be Like Mark - the brand new Prequel to "Be Like Mark"

Lets go back to Mars and try to survive!
Do you plant enough potatoes to survive the SOLS  until your crew comes back to rescue you? 

RepositoryLink: https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/belikemark_v02_the-prequel/src/master/

Great Programming Support by Jörg Sroka! MVP! 

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" Summer Semester 2019)
